tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_updates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    software_name VARCHAR(255),
    version VARCHAR(50),
    update_date DATE,
    vehicle_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE electric_vehicle_systems (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_model VARCHAR(255),
    battery_capacity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    software_version VARCHAR(50),
    last_update_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vin VARCHAR(17) UNIQUE,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT
);

CREATE TABLE system_updates (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    software_update_id INT,
    vehicle_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  year INT NOT NULL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
  update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  update_version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  update_description TEXT,
  update_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE updates_history (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  update_id INT NOT NULL,
  applied_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE software_errors (
  error_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  error_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  error_description TEXT,
  error_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE update_alerts (
  alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_date TIMESTAMP
)
